Text: Adding the following constraints entries 1 Nonsuccession between sensitive checks and decisions Add to nonsuccession section declaremodelnonsuccessionCheckApplicantRace FinalDecision support10 Also for CheckApplicantGender FinalDecision etc 2 Response from sensitive checks to MitigationCheck Add to response section declaremodelresponseCheckApplicantRace BiasMitigationCheck support10 Also similarly for CheckApplicantGender to BiasMitigationCheck 3 Coexistence between FinalDecision and ManualReview Add to coexistence section declaremodelcoexistenceFinalDecision ManualReview support10

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Putting this all together heres the plan for the new constraints Adding to the declaremodel In the nonsuccession section CheckApplicantRace cannot be succeeded by FinalDecision directly So declaremodelnonsuccessionCheckApplicantRaceFinalDecision support10 Similarly for other sensitive checks Next response from CheckApplicantRace to BiasMitigationCheck Add to response section declaremodelresponseCheckApplicantRace BiasMitigationCheck support10 Then coexistence between FinalDecision and ManualReview so that whenever FinalDecision is present ManualReview is also present Thus adding to coexistence section declaremodelcoexistenceFinalDecision ManualReview support10
